Traits.Name: Evasive Presence
Traits.Content: The Escalator Wraith has advantage on Dexterity saving throws and ranged attacks against it have disadvantage.

Traits.Name: Haunting Motion
Traits.Content: Once per turn, when a creature moves within 10 feet of the Escalator Wraith, they must succeed on a DC 16 Wisdom saving throw or become frightened until the end of their next turn.

Actions.Name: Multiattack
Actions.Content: The Escalator Wraith makes two Touch of the Unseen attacks and one Grasp of Despair attack.

Actions.Name: Touch of the Unseen
Actions.Content: Melee Spell Attack: +8 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 14 (2d8 + 5) necrotic damage. The target must succeed on a DC 16 Constitution saving throw or have disadvantage on the next attack roll it makes before the end of its next turn.

Actions.Name: Grasp of Despair
Actions.Content: Melee Spell Attack: +8 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 20 (3d8 + 6) psychic damage. The target must succeed on a DC 16 Wisdom saving throw or become paralyzed until the end of its next turn.

Actions.Name: Ethereal Glide
Actions.Content: The Escalator Wraith can become incorporeal, allowing it to pass through creatures and objects. As part of this action, it can make one touch attack against a creature. This attack deals 25 (4d10 + 4) necrotic damage, and the target must succeed on a DC 16 Dexterity saving throw or be grappled (escape DC 16) until the start of the wraith's next turn. This ability recharges after a short or long rest.
